definition: pine and cypress/fig. chaste and undefiled/fig. tomb
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: The male gametophytes of conifers and angiosperms are the POLLEN grains .
sentences.chinese: 松柏类植物以及被子植物的雄配子体即花粉粒。

sentences.english: The Master said, "Only when the year turns freezing cold do we realize that pines and cypresses are the last to wither."
sentences.chinese: 孔子说，“岁月遇严寒，才知道松柏是最后凋谢的。”

sentences.english: Residents planted flowers and trees including pine and cypress in the yards.
sentences.chinese: 每座房子都是一二层高，院子里栽有花草和松柏等。

sentences.english: We never said our love was evergreen, or as unchanging as the sea.
sentences.chinese: 未曾说过我们的爱如松柏常青，或如沧海不变。

sentences.english: The new models include models of bamboo, conifers, willows and countless other species.
sentences.chinese: 新的模型包含有竹子，松柏，柳树和无数其它的物种。

sentences.english: Amber is the fossilized resin of ancient pines and cypresses.
sentences.chinese: 琥珀是古代松柏树脂的化石。

sentences.english: The pine trees and cypresses, sparsely dotted on the hillside, seem to be clearer in sight.
sentences.chinese: 山腰里的寥落松柏也似乎看得清楚了。

sentences.english: When will the actual building starts building?
sentences.chinese: 松柏楼的建造将于何时开始？

sentences.english: The into the forest with great refreshing scent.
sentences.chinese: 接著到了森林里面，漫溢松柏的芳香。

sentences.english: And the oak tree and the cypress grow not in each other's shadow.
sentences.chinese: 橡树和松柏，也不在彼此的荫翳中生长。

sentences.english: Rocky mountain peaks covered with delicate pine treas are shrouded in clouds and mist.
sentences.chinese: 松柏覆盖着的山峰被云雾笼罩。

definition: evergreen pine and cypress (idiom); steadfast nobility
verdant/lush green and full of life
